channel.title: How to edit an Rsps on two computers?
channel.description: Hello, I was wondering if there is any way that two people can edit the same rsps from different computers? If there is a way could you please help me? Thanks.

item.title: How to edit an Rsps on two computers?
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“Justin Bieber, post:5, topic:544896”]Just send files around via email[/quote]I do hope you’re trolling.

item.title: How to edit an Rsps on two computers?
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“Ganstat, post:3, topic:544896”]On a Vps impossible because you can’t share a compuer lol.[/quote]No

As Pure_ said use SVN or Git, you can easely track changes this way and clonse for testing or some shit, it might take some time getting used to but it’s worth it.

Read full topic
